ygData.subject: Re: Root spell
ygData.msgSnippet: You have to make your Alteration skill better. Practise it ... From: Gregory Egan  To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
You have to make your Alteration skill better.
Practise it


-----Original Message-----
From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, May 01, 1999 1:04 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Root spell


>From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
>I recently purchased the root spell and tried it out on an easy target, a
>large rat, to see how well it would work. I'm currently level 7. The spell
>hardly ever works for me. Will it be more effective the more you cast it? I
>can't see trying to use it on higher level creatures to gain xp if I can't
>even root a large rat.
>
>Greg (Kronan)
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Did you know that knowledge is power?
>http://www.ONElist.com
>Join a new ONElist e-mail community and strengthen your mind!
>
